title: Corda Membership Configuration Schema
description: Configuration schema for the membership subsection.

maxDurationBetweenSyncRequestsMinutes.description: The maximum duration in minutes between member list synchronization requests.

TTLs.description: The maximum durations in minutes to wait for different types of message to send. If set to null, Corda waits forever.

membersPackageUpdate.description: The maximum duration in minutes to wait for a members package update message.

declineRegistration.description: The maximum duration in minutes to wait for a decline registration message.

updateToPendingAutoApproval.description: The maximum duration in minutes to wait for a message to update registration status to pending auto approval.

verifyMemberRequest.description: The maximum duration in minutes to wait for a verify member request.

waitForMgmSession.description: The maximum duration in minutes to wait for a member to establish connection with the MGM. This only has effect on time waiting for an MGM to establish a session with a member as part of processing a registration request.
